Standard sight.
A lightweight design, good for recoil control.

Snapshot sight. 
Excellent handling.
Superb target acquisition.

Agile sight. 
Lightning-fast handling.
Reloading this weapon after a kill grants a damage bonus for a short time.
This weapon gains better target acquisition.
Aiming this weapon increases its effective range.
Readying this weapon grants a brief period of bonus accuracy.
Kills with this weapon grant enhanced motion tracker resolution for a short time.
Causing damage with this weapon increases its stability.
Quick unassisted kills with this weapon reduce grenade and melee cooldown.
Melee kills automatically reload a portion of this weapon's magazine.

Stable sight. 
Optimized for excellent recoil control.

Flexible sight. 
Light, with good recoil control.
Strong target acquisition.
This weapon causes Void Damage.

This weapon causes Void Damage.
Consume a more powerful Weapon to boost the Attack value of this Weapon.
This weapon is effective at an extended range.
Increases weapon stability.

These iridium-core rounds overpenetrate targets.
Their mass slows down weapon handling.

Oversize rounds built to stagger targets and leave them reeling.
Their mass makes a weapon harder to handle.
Reload this weapon even faster.
When held, this weapon grants +2 character Agility.
Aiming this weapon is incredibly fast.
This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
This weapon has bonus accuracy while firing from the hip.
This weapon has improved muzzle velocity.
